name: SCP-106: The escape
description:
Controls:

W - Walk forward

A - Walk left

S - Walk right

C - Crouch

D - Walk backwards

Left Shift - Run

E - Pick item

G - Turn on/off flashlight

Friendly Note: This is a University project. Please do take a moment to fill this questionnaire I made. It helps me understand from the perspective of the player!

https://forms.gle/nzQqLY1nvbbn7N5T7 

*This is an alpha version of this game.*

This is a first person, survival horror game, based on SCP-106. The player is an agent, sent by the SCP Foundation to find clues in that area, regarding to SCP-106. It takes place on a forest, where it is believed this place has some sort of connection regarding to SCP-106 back in world war 1, which he might have fought as a soldier.
